import cv2
import numpy as np
src = cv2.imread('img/coins.jpg')
gray=cv2.cvtColor(src, cv2.COLOR_BGR2GRAY)
ret,thresh2 = cv2.threshold(gray, 200, 255, cv2.THRESH_BINARY_INV)
cv2.imshow('NXW', thresh2)
cv2.waitKey(0)
cv2.destroyAllWindows()

import cv2
img=cv2.imread('img/coins.jpg',0)
ret,otsu=cv2.threshold(img,0,255, cv2.THRESH_BINARY_INV + cv2.THRESH_OTSU)
cv2.imshow("NXW", otsu)
cv2.waitKey(0)
cv2.destroyAllWindows()

import cv2
img=cv2.imread('img/coins.jpg',0)
athdMEAN=cv2.adaptiveThreshold(img, 255, cv2.ADAPTIVE_THRESH_MEAN_C, cv2.THRESH_BINARY, 7, 5)
athdGAUS=cv2.adaptiveThreshold(img, 255, cv2.ADAPTIVE_THRESH_GAUSSIAN_C, cv2.THRESH_BINARY, 5, 3)
cv2.imshow("athdMEAN", athdMEAN)
cv2.imshow("athdGAUS", athdGAUS)
cv2.waitKey(0)
cv2.destroyAllWindows()

import cv2
import numpy as np
src = cv2.imread('img/coins.jpg')
gray=cv2.cvtColor(src, cv2.COLOR_BGR2GRAY)
ret, thresh1 = cv2.threshold(gray, 200, 255, cv2.THRESH_BINARY_INV)
cv2.imshow('NLH', thresh1)
cv2.waitKey(0)
cv2.destroyAllWindows()

import cv2
img=cv2.imread('img/coins.jpg',0)
#使用cv2.THRESH_BINARY与cv2.THRESH_OTSU进行Otsu阈值处理
ret,otsu=cv2.threshold(img,0,255, cv2.THRESH_BINARY_INV + cv2.THRESH_OTSU)
cv2.imshow("NLH", otsu)
cv2.waitKey(0)
cv2.destroyAllWindows()

import cv2
img=cv2.imread('img/coins.jpg',0)
#使用cv2.ADAPTIVE_THRESH_MEAN_C进行自适应阈值处理
athdMEAN=cv2.adaptiveThreshold(img, 255, cv2.ADAPTIVE_THRESH_MEAN_C, cv2.THRESH_BINARY, 7, 5)
#使用cv2.ADAPTIVE_THRESH_GAUSSIAN_C进行自适应阈值处理
athdGAUS=cv2.adaptiveThreshold(img, 255, cv2.ADAPTIVE_THRESH_GAUSSIAN_C, cv2.THRESH_BINARY, 5, 3)
cv2.imshow("NLH", athdMEAN)
cv2.imshow("NLH", athdGAUS)
cv2.waitKey(0)
cv2.destroyAllWindows()

import cv2#导入OpenCV库
import numpy as np
src = cv2.imread('img/coins.jpg')#读取dcz.jpg图像
gray=cv2.cvtColor(src, cv2.COLOR_BGR2GRAY)  #图像类型转换函数，转换为灰度图像
ret,thresh2 = cv2.threshold(gray, 200, 255, cv2.THRESH_BINARY_INV)#反二值化阈值处理
cv2.imshow('src', src)
cv2.imshow('gray', gray)
cv2.imshow('FS', thresh2)
cv2.waitKey(0)
cv2.destroyAllWindows()

#使用cv2.THRESH_BINARY与cv2.THRESH_OTSU进行Otsu阈值处理

import cv2
import numpy as np

src = cv2.imread('img/coins.jpg')


gray = cv2.cvtColor(src, cv2.COLOR_BGR2GRAY)


ret, thresh2 = cv2.threshold(gray, 200, 255, cv2.THRESH_BINARY_INV)


cv2.imshow('src', src)


cv2.imshow('gray', gray)


cv2.imshow('yangzhengrong', thresh2)


cv2.waitKey(0)


cv2.destroyAllWindows()

import cv2


image_path = 'img/coins.jpg'
image = cv2.imread(image_path, cv2.IMREAD_GRAYSCALE)


ret, thresh = cv2.threshold(image, 0, 255, cv2.THRESH_BINARY_INV + cv2.THRESH_OTSU)


cv2.imshow('yangzhengrong', thresh) 
cv2.waitKey(0) 
cv2.destroyAllWindows()

cv2.imwrite('result.jpg', thresh)

import cv2


image_path = 'img/coins.jpg'
image = cv2.imread(image_path, cv2.IMREAD_GRAYSCALE)

mean_thresh = cv2.adaptiveThreshold(image, 255, cv2.ADAPTIVE_THRESH_MEAN_C, cv2.THRESH_BINARY_INV, 7, 5)


gaussian_thresh = cv2.adaptiveThreshold(image, 255, cv2.ADAPTIVE_THRESH_GAUSSIAN_C, cv2.THRESH_BINARY_INV, 5, 3)


cv2.imshow('yzngzhengrong', mean_thresh) 
cv2.imshow('yangzhengrong', gaussian_thresh) 
cv2.waitKey(0)  
cv2.destroyAllWindows()


cv2.imwrite('mean_result.jpg', mean_thresh)
cv2.imwrite('gaussian_result.jpg', gaussian_thresh)

import cv2
img=cv2.imread('img/coins.jpg',0)

cv2.destroyAllWindows()

import cv2
img=cv2.imread('sucai4/coins.jpg',0)
athdMEAN=cv2.adaptiveThreshold(img,255,cv2.ADAPTIVE_THRESH_MEAN_C,cv2.THRESH_BINARY,7,5)
athdGAUD=cv2.adaptiveThreshold(img,255,cv2.ADAPTIVE_THRESH_MEAN_C,cv2.THRESH_BINARY,5,3)
cv2.imshow("GJZ",athdMEAN)
cv2.imshow("GJZ1",athdGAUD)
cv2.waitKey(0)
cv2.destroyAllWindows()

import cv2
import numpy as np
src = cv2.imread('img/coins.jpg')
gray=cv2.cvtColor(src, cv2.COLOR_BGR2GRAY)
ret,thresh2 = cv2.threshold(gray, 200, 255, cv2.THRESH_BINARY_INV)
cv2.imshow('src', src)
cv2.imshow('gray', gray)
cv2.imshow('XYH', thresh2)
cv2.waitKey(0)
cv2.destroyAllWindows()

import cv2
img=cv2.imread('img/coins.jpg',0)
athdMEAN=cv2.adaptiveThreshold(img, 255, cv2.ADAPTIVE_THRESH_MEAN_C, cv2.THRESH_BINARY, 7, 5)
athdGAUS=cv2.adaptiveThreshold(img, 255, cv2.ADAPTIVE_THRESH_GAUSSIAN_C, cv2.THRESH_BINARY, 5, 3)

cv2.imshow("athdGAUS", athdGAUS)
cv2.waitKey(0)
cv2.destroyAllWindows()

import cv2

import cv2

img=cv2.imread('img/img/coins.jpg',0)
img1=cv2.adaptiveThreshold(img, 255, cv2.ADAPTIVE_THRESH_MEAN_C, cv2.THRESH_BINARY, 7, 5)
cv2.imshow("huanggongyi", img1)
cv2.waitKey(0)
cv2.destroyAllWindows()
高斯自适应：
import cv2
img=cv2.imread('img/img/coins.jpg',0)
img1=cv2.adaptiveThreshold(img, 255, cv2.ADAPTIVE_THRESH_GAUSSIAN_C, cv2.THRESH_BINARY, 5, 3)
cv2.imshow("huanggongyi", img1)
cv2.waitKey(0)
cv2.destroyAllWindows()

题目2.正确答案:
正确答案：
import cv2src = cv2.imread('./img/coins.jpg')gray = cv2.cvtColor(src, cv2.COLOR_BGR2GRAY)ret, otsu = cv2.threshold(gray, 0, 255, cv2.THRESH_BINARY_INV + cv2.THRESH_OTSU)cv2.imshow('JXJ', otsu)cv2.waitKey(0)cv2.destroyAllWindows()

题目3.正确答案:
正确答案：
import cv2src = cv2.imread('./img/coins.jpg')gray = cv2.cvtColor(src, cv2.COLOR_BGR2GRAY)athdMEAN=cv2.adaptiveThreshold(gray, 255, cv2.ADAPTIVE_THRESH_MEAN_C, cv2.THRESH_BINARY, 7, 5)#使用cv2.ADAPTIVE_THRESH_GAUSSIAN_C进行自适应阈值处理athdGAUS=cv2.adaptiveThreshold(gray, 255, cv2.ADAPTIVE_THRESH_GAUSSIAN_C, cv2.THRESH_BINARY, 5, 3)cv2.imshow('JXJ', athdMEAN)cv2.imshow('JXJ2', athdGAUS)cv2.waitKey(0)cv2.destroyAllWindows()

text:
读取img文件夹下的"coins.jpg"，分别使用均值自适应阈值法和高斯自适应阈值法处理硬币图像，参数要求如下。显示运行的效果并截图，窗口用你的拼音来命名。
- 均值自适应阈值法：blockSize=7, c=5
- 高斯自适应阈值法：blockSize=5, c=3
